basics.name: Matthew Drover
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: Matt is originally from Upper Island Cove, Newfoundland & Labrador. He received his Bachelor of Engineering from Memorial University of Newfoundland after a 6 year co-op program. He is a passionate developer who is constantly looking for new, interesting problems to solve and better ways of solving them.

work.position: Senior Software Engineer, Tools and Infrastructure, IV
Software Engineer, Tools and Infrastructure, III
highlights: Tech lead for a team of 7 developers
Engineering-Productivity lead for Cloud-NAT and CloudNet-Control
Designed and implemented tool to index and version workflow artifacts

work.position: Software Engineer, Tools and Infrastructure, II
highlights: Designed and implemented processes to automate qualification and release of Cloud-Network components
Designed and implementated tool to build domain specific data extractors
Analyzed device battery logs to determine battery drain issues
Assisted development of Perl and Visual Basic scripts to aid in battery log analysis
Performed regular sanity testing on devices
Obtained experience in High Level Architecture (HLA) development
Implemented visual representation of environment using Vega Prime Marine
Integrated PhysX physics engine into existing simulation engine
Performed regular sanity and regression tests on a suite of simulation software
Designed and implemented an application in Python to streamline the sanity/regression testing process
